TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_’_tayal, title = ’_tayal, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/’_tayal} }

S.FORM: 'tayal hya' ga mtnaq kwara' kwara' nyux maki' rhzyal Taiwan qani ka gluw gluw sawn minqwas biru' maha "Nantaw Mincuw'". ru spzyang whci' balay nyux ki'an rhzyal maki' sa rgyax na Taiwan qaniy. 'tayal hya' ga gluw squliq nakinraral laha' yalaw gi kya Gaga' na mutuw kmut tunux ru sisay maha niwan laha' qu mutuw galan pspngan maha squliq balay kinraral qu laha qaniy. cyux maki' squ pzyang balay wagiq balay qsahuy rgrgyax Taiwan qaniy, aring kya Tose' Taycyuw, ruw siy qaysiy mucing Karingkoo mkura' tay mkraya' Taiwan, sisay spzyang balay whci' rhzyal naha' iy slpuw sa squliq pkaki' rgyax nanak qu lpgun. Kahul squ kay' na senmung pkingkyuw sa kinhuzyan nnanu' na "Gakusiya'" ga, aring sqani pllpgun lga, nanu' squ ki'a wayal hmzinas zmagal syan msyaw lga, rima' mqyanux sqani qu 'tayal qaniy la, nanu' yasa qu kin'tan naha' kya puqing llyung na llyung maymutang qu kni'an pinsalan naha', kawas qasa hya' lga ki'a wal sa zyuwaw na sazing syan kawas squ cyugal syan kawas lma. Rhzyal cyux naha' ki'an kahul squ knita' nqu minlahang rhzyal qaniy ga cyux mgazyang maki' squ lnglingay na Cyu'o Sammyaku ru lnglingay na rgyax papak waqa', yaqu mnayang squ tmqsinuw qu sqyanux naha'. squliq na Ptasan kin ini' ptnaq naha' sa squliq bzinah hya' ga, kya patas rqyas naha'. yalaw giy watal swalan na Sexu' smbuci' maha qutux nanak na gluw qu Truku' maha gluw na Truku' lalu' naha' la. aw' ga skahul sa hngzyang na kkayal naha' ga, pzyux balay qu mtnaq na' kay' naha' hya'. Kinkhmauy na squliq naha' tayhuk sa kawas tay kbhul ru zmagal(2016kawas na amirika') pinlpuw na Sexu' ga wayal tayhuk mtzyu' mang cyugal syan hi' naha' la. kkayal sa kay' na 'tayal squ squliq atu' na skahul squ ptbcyan lalu' na minqyanux babaw cinbwanan qaniy ga, minqyanux na baq 'msuna' squ mnqyanux na ini' 'suna', baq 'msuna' hya' ga nanu' yaqu Squliq ru qqsinuw, qqbhniq, ru qlqulih, ru kaykuwi', nanu' minkahul kya pintbcyan na lalu' na squliq hya', ini' ptnaq qsinuw squ Squliq. nanu' yasa qu Squliq hya' ga lalu' na binkgan pinbcyan na kwara' minqyanux qaniy hya'. nanu' ktan su' ka mutuw kmayal qu Buksi' sraral maha "ita' ka squliq nyux mqyanux sa babaw cinnwanan qaniy ga, ini' ta' siy pinhmut mqyanux, gi ini' ta' ptnaq sa qqsinuw ka ini' qbaq sa sayux qu qqsinuw hya'." nanu' qu sawn lalu' na 'tayal hya' 'tayal hya' ga, pinbcyan lalu' nqu mtnaq gaga' ru mtnaq la kay' kkayal naha'. ini' ptnaq gaga' ru ini' ptnaq la kay' lga Paris naha' qasa hya' la. 'tayal balay maha qu kay' qasa hya' ga, spzyang balay baq mqyanux na 'tayal maha qu kay' niya' balay. nanu' mbhuzyaw kya qu squliq lru, siy ptbuci' nanak qu ppgluw krayryax lga, maki' lqu pintbcyan lalu' nqu qutux qutux gluw na lahuy na squliq la, nanu' kahul squ kinki'an naha' qu 'ringan smlalu' sa lalu' na qutux qutux lahuy na squliq la, nanu' maki' kya lqu sawn maha' 'tayal, ru Baybuzyuq, tu Bunun, ru Cow, ru Saw, ru Rukay, ru Paiwan, ru Ta'u', ru Amis qani la. kahul ta' inu' musa' baqun balay mita' qu kin-ini' ptnaq na Squliq squ 'tayal qaniy? ktan su' kya qu squliq p'agal 'ina' ga, mutuw naha' pqutan maha "kahul inu' qu ina' su'? 'tayal ini' ga Plmukan? ini' ga bunun?", ungat ana qutux mutuw maqut maha "Plmukan ini' ga Squliq? hya' kiy!", nanu' yasa qu baqun sqani maha lalu' na 'tayal hya' ga lalu' na pinbcyan na qutux quutx luhing gluw na squliq qasa hya'. 'tayal hya' ga lalu' na krahu' squ binkgan pinbcyan na Squliq qasa hya'. hmswa' qu pins'ulah nqu gluw na 'tayal squ gluw na sziq qaniy kahul sa Gaga' naha' ru kay' naha' mita' ga, 'tayal squ Seziq qaniy mita' ga, nanu' qu s'uciy naha muci qaniy ga, minqutux kwara maha qu qnbaq kwara' nqu 'tayal kila sziq qani hya, kkayal qani uzi ga, aring sraral na' ga, mtnaq kwara' knita' naha' qani hiya'. aring knaki' sqani na Gipun na' ga, yalaw gi spzyang naha' baqun maha kya qu squliq na ptasan rqyas ga nanu' yaqu 'tayal kya Pyasan ha, nanu' skahul naha' squ kay' naha' nanak maha sami hya' ga 'tayal sami maha ru, nanu' aring kya qu kya lqu lalu' na 'tayal ka Ptasan rqyas qaniy la. nanu' yasa lruw mzyup kya sa kska' balay na Taiwan qu Gipun lga, ktan naha' kya maha kya uzi qu gluw na Se'ediq la, ga aki' maki' qu sawn binkgan pinbcyan na gluw squliq maki' Taiwan ru spgluw naha' sa Tayal Zoku qu lalu' na Se'ediq la, ga nanu' qu 'tayal balay hya' lga, Taiyal yazoku sawn miru' na Gakusya' misu qani hya'. spzyang hngzyangan lalu' na 'tayalzoku miru' qu Gipun qaniy ga, balay ga 'tayal maha qu kay' ga, sbahun naha' maha Ataiyaru' miru, ga Se'ediq hya' lga Setaka' sawn naha' miru' la, balay ga 'tayal ga ǝ-ta-yal maha qu balay, ru Se'ediq hiya' lga sǝ-e-diq maha qu balay na hngzyang naha' hiya', mwah squ Thayluw qaniy lga, Tai-ya-cu' sawn naha' miru' qu 'tayal hya' ru Sai-tǝ-kǝ sawn naha' miru' qu Se'ediq hya' la. kahul inu' qu sinllwan maha "Zoku" qaniy balay ga lalu' na sawn maha "Zoku" qani ga, ana maha 'tayal ini' ga se'ediq qani gaiyat mnaki' qu kkayal qaniy hya'. nanu' yaqu aki' naha' sr'tun kwara' qu ulah na 'tayal qani ru skbalay naha' sa binkgan pinbcyan na lalu' na qitix gluw, nanu' yasa qu sikiy psulung sa binkgan pinbcyan nqu maha maha nanu' qu pincgwi'an na qutux gluw na Bunmesyakay, kwara' qu sawn maha ubuy na binkgan pinbcyan qaniy ga sikiy kya lalu' kwara' qutux qutux pintbcyan, nanu' yaniy qu sinllwan naha' lalu' na "Zoku" qaniy. iy skayal ta' kay' na 'tayal ga musa' yaquw sawn maha "ulah na lalu' binkgan pinbcyan" maha qu imi' niya', ga bali mutuw skayal krayryax qu kay' qnaiy hya', yalaw gi binkgan na oinbcyan qaniy hya' ga kahul squ sinllwan na Bunmesyakay qu lalu' qaniy hya', saw su' iyal qu lalu' na "yazu'" uzi ga sni' naha' squ maha mtnaq sa puqin lalu' qu ulah niya' ka mtnaq lalu' nasa lga, yasa qu syan naha' maha "yazu'" qani la. ga bali ta' ini' baqiy kwara' maha iyat mnaki' trayryax sraral qu sinllwan qani hya. Sawn ta' nanu' hmkangi' qu lalu' sraral na gluw nqu Ptasan rqyas qaniy Skahul ta'squ sinllwan nanak na ''tayal qu sawn maha squliq qani hya' ga, balay balay hya' qu sawn na gluw 'tayal maha Squliq" squ sawn na gluw na s'ziq maha "se'ediq" ini' ga sawn naha' "sziq" ga mtnaq kwara'maha yasa qu sawn ta' pinbcyan ta' squ Squliq minqyanux cinbwanan qaniy. Gaga' hya' lga mtnaq qutux lalu' na binkagan pinbcyan kwara qaniy hya'. yalaw gi bali mnaki' biru' naha' miru' sraral rwa! musa' nanak yaqu skahul sa mtnaq Gaga' naha' ru yaqu musa' 'llaw iyal baqun mita' sa rqyas ru inrkyasan naha', aw'ru kkayal sa kay' naha' musa' hmkangi' squ sisay pinsqtuxan na lalu' naha' sraral la, nanu' skahul sa wayal skal qani pspung lga, musa' nanak yaqu maha "Ptasan Zoku" qu musa' m'uluw kya qu lalu' naha' la. pinslabang mqyanux na gluw na Ptasan aring sa minqutux sraral (ptasan族群從ptasan時代的發展) pinslabang kahul na ptasan sraral hya' ga aring squ sungus na mbhuzyaw qu squliq niya' ru msgagay mshzi' tay bbzinah na rhzyal, kahul squ mshzi' lru m'sazing na ulah ka gluw na 'tayal squ gluw na sziq qaniy la. babaw niya' lawzi lga, nanu' qu sazing ulan nqu Ptasan ka 'tayalru sziq qaniy ga, nyux mtbuci' msinna cyugal uziy qu ulah naha' nanak uziy la. ru taqu gluw na 'tayal hya' lga, mslabang mqyanux lawziy lru nyux msincyugal uziy qu pinbcyan na kkayal kay' naha' misuw qaniy la, nanu' gluw na Mkmuyaw, ru gluw na Mesali', ru gluw na Kinhakulcyugal ini' ptnaq ubuy na kkayal kay' qaniy. nanu' qu ulah na sziq uziy ga, mslabang mqyanux uziy lru nyux msincyugal uziy qu pinbcyan na kkayal kay' naha' misuw qaniy uziy la, nanu' yaqu gluw na Truku', ru gluw na towda', ru yaqu gluw na Tkdaya' cyugal ini' ptnaq pinbcyan kkayal na kay' naha' qaniy. yalaw gi wayal swalan na Sexu' ulah na sziq maha' ptbuci' nanak mg qutux nanak na Zoku' lruw, iyat pkaki' squ musa' maku' pngaygay pinqzyu' babaw niya' qu ulah naha' hya' la.

'tayal hya' ga mtnaq kwara' kwara' nyox maki' rhzyal Taiwan qani ka glow glow sawn minqwas biro' maha "Nantaw Mincow'". ro spzyang whci' balay nyox ki'an rhzyal maki' sa rgyax na Taiwan qaniy. 'tayal hya' ga glow sqoliq nakinraral laha' yalaw gi kya Gaga' na motow kmot tonox ro sisay maha niwan laha' qo motow galan pspngan maha sqoliq balay kinraral qo laha qaniy. cyox maki' sqo pzyang balay wagiq balay qsahoy rgrgyax Taiwan qaniy, aring kya Tose' Taycyow, row siy qaysiy mocing Karingkoo mkora' tay mkraya' Taiwan, sisay spzyang balay whci' rhzyal naha' iy slpow sa sqoliq pkaki' rgyax nanak qo lpgon. Kahol sqo kay' na senmong pkingkyow sa kinhozyan nnano' na "Gakosiya'" ga, aring sqani pllpgon lga, nano' sqo ki'a wayal hmzinas zmagal syan msyaw lga, rima' mqyanox sqani qo 'tayal qaniy la, nano' yasa qo kin'tan naha' kya poqing llyong na llyong maymotang qo kni'an pinsalan naha', kawas qasa hya' lga ki'a wal sa zyowaw na sazing syan kawas sqo cyogal syan kawas lma. Rhzyal cyox naha' ki'an kahol sqo knita' nqo minlahang rhzyal qaniy ga cyox mgazyang maki' sqo lnglingay na Cyo'o Sammyako ro lnglingay na rgyax papak waqa', yaqo mnayang sqo tmqsinow qo sqyanox naha'. sqoliq na Ptasan kin ini' ptnaq naha' sa sqoliq bzinah hya' ga, kya patas rqyas naha'. yalaw giy watal swalan na Sexo' smboci' maha qotox nanak na glow qo Troko' maha glow na Troko' lalo' naha' la. aw' ga skahol sa hngzyang na kkayal naha' ga, pzyox balay qo mtnaq na' kay' naha' hya'. Kinkhmaoy na sqoliq naha' tayhok sa kawas tay kbhol ro zmagal(2016kawas na amirika') pinlpow na Sexo' ga wayal tayhok mtzyo' mang cyogal syan hi' naha' la. kkayal sa kay' na 'tayal sqo sqoliq ato' na skahol sqo ptbcyan lalo' na minqyanox babaw cinbwanan qaniy ga, minqyanox na baq 'msona' sqo mnqyanox na ini' 'sona', baq 'msona' hya' ga nano' yaqo Sqoliq ro qqsinow, qqbhniq, ro qlqolih, ro kaykowi', nano' minkahol kya pintbcyan na lalo' na sqoliq hya', ini' ptnaq qsinow sqo Sqoliq. nano' yasa qo Sqoliq hya' ga lalo' na binkgan pinbcyan na kwara' minqyanox qaniy hya'. nano' ktan so' ka motow kmayal qo Boksi' sraral maha "ita' ka sqoliq nyox mqyanox sa babaw cinnwanan qaniy ga, ini' ta' siy pinhmot mqyanox, gi ini' ta' ptnaq sa qqsinow ka ini' qbaq sa sayox qo qqsinow hya'." nano' qo sawn lalo' na 'tayal hya' 'tayal hya' ga, pinbcyan lalo' nqo mtnaq gaga' ro mtnaq la kay' kkayal naha'. ini' ptnaq gaga' ro ini' ptnaq la kay' lga Paris naha' qasa hya' la. 'tayal balay maha qo kay' qasa hya' ga, spzyang balay baq mqyanox na 'tayal maha qo kay' niya' balay. nano' mbhozyaw kya qo sqoliq lro, siy ptboci' nanak qo ppglow krayryax lga, maki' lqo pintbcyan lalo' nqo qotox qotox glow na lahoy na sqoliq la, nano' kahol sqo kinki'an naha' qo 'ringan smlalo' sa lalo' na qotox qotox lahoy na sqoliq la, nano' maki' kya lqo sawn maha' 'tayal, ro Baybozyoq, to Bonon, ro Cow, ro Saw, ro Rokay, ro Paiwan, ro Ta'o', ro Amis qani la. kahol ta' ino' mosa' baqon balay mita' qo kin-ini' ptnaq na Sqoliq sqo 'tayal qaniy? ktan so' kya qo sqoliq p'agal 'ina' ga, motow naha' pqotan maha "kahol ino' qo ina' so'? 'tayal ini' ga Plmokan? ini' ga bonon?", ongat ana qotox motow maqot maha "Plmokan ini' ga Sqoliq? hya' kiy!", nano' yasa qo baqon sqani maha lalo' na 'tayal hya' ga lalo' na pinbcyan na qotox qootx lohing glow na sqoliq qasa hya'. 'tayal hya' ga lalo' na kraho' sqo binkgan pinbcyan na Sqoliq qasa hya'. hmswa' qo pins'olah nqo glow na 'tayal sqo glow na sziq qaniy kahol sa Gaga' naha' ro kay' naha' mita' ga, 'tayal sqo Seziq qaniy mita' ga, nano' qo s'ociy naha moci qaniy ga, minqotox kwara maha qo qnbaq kwara' nqo 'tayal kila sziq qani hya, kkayal qani ozi ga, aring sraral na' ga, mtnaq kwara' knita' naha' qani hiya'. aring knaki' sqani na Gipon na' ga, yalaw gi spzyang naha' baqon maha kya qo sqoliq na ptasan rqyas ga nano' yaqo 'tayal kya Pyasan ha, nano' skahol naha' sqo kay' naha' nanak maha sami hya' ga 'tayal sami maha ro, nano' aring kya qo kya lqo lalo' na 'tayal ka Ptasan rqyas qaniy la. nano' yasa lrow mzyop kya sa kska' balay na Taiwan qo Gipon lga, ktan naha' kya maha kya ozi qo glow na Se'ediq la, ga aki' maki' qo sawn binkgan pinbcyan na glow sqoliq maki' Taiwan ro spglow naha' sa Tayal Zoko qo lalo' na Se'ediq la, ga nano' qo 'tayal balay hya' lga, Taiyal yazoko sawn miro' na Gakosya' miso qani hya'. spzyang hngzyangan lalo' na 'tayalzoko miro' qo Gipon qaniy ga, balay ga 'tayal maha qo kay' ga, sbahon naha' maha Ataiyaro' miro, ga Se'ediq hya' lga Setaka' sawn naha' miro' la, balay ga 'tayal ga ǝ-ta-yal maha qo balay, ro Se'ediq hiya' lga sǝ-e-diq maha qo balay na hngzyang naha' hiya', mwah sqo Thaylow qaniy lga, Tai-ya-co' sawn naha' miro' qo 'tayal hya' ro Sai-tǝ-kǝ sawn naha' miro' qo Se'ediq hya' la. kahol ino' qo sinllwan maha "Zoko" qaniy balay ga lalo' na sawn maha "Zoko" qani ga, ana maha 'tayal ini' ga se'ediq qani gaiyat mnaki' qo kkayal qaniy hya'. nano' yaqo aki' naha' sr'ton kwara' qo olah na 'tayal qani ro skbalay naha' sa binkgan pinbcyan na lalo' na qitix glow, nano' yasa qo sikiy psolong sa binkgan pinbcyan nqo maha maha nano' qo pincgwi'an na qotox glow na Bonmesyakay, kwara' qo sawn maha oboy na binkgan pinbcyan qaniy ga sikiy kya lalo' kwara' qotox qotox pintbcyan, nano' yaniy qo sinllwan naha' lalo' na "Zoko" qaniy. iy skayal ta' kay' na 'tayal ga mosa' yaqow sawn maha "olah na lalo' binkgan pinbcyan" maha qo imi' niya', ga bali motow skayal krayryax qo kay' qnaiy hya', yalaw gi binkgan na oinbcyan qaniy hya' ga kahol sqo sinllwan na Bonmesyakay qo lalo' qaniy hya', saw so' iyal qo lalo' na "yazo'" ozi ga sni' naha' sqo maha mtnaq sa poqin lalo' qo olah niya' ka mtnaq lalo' nasa lga, yasa qo syan naha' maha "yazo'" qani la. ga bali ta' ini' baqiy kwara' maha iyat mnaki' trayryax sraral qo sinllwan qani hya. Sawn ta' nano' hmkangi' qo lalo' sraral na glow nqo Ptasan rqyas qaniy Skahol ta'sqo sinllwan nanak na ''tayal qo sawn maha sqoliq qani hya' ga, balay balay hya' qo sawn na glow 'tayal maha Sqoliq" sqo sawn na glow na s'ziq maha "se'ediq" ini' ga sawn naha' "sziq" ga mtnaq kwara'maha yasa qo sawn ta' pinbcyan ta' sqo Sqoliq minqyanox cinbwanan qaniy. Gaga' hya' lga mtnaq qotox lalo' na binkagan pinbcyan kwara qaniy hya'. yalaw gi bali mnaki' biro' naha' miro' sraral rwa! mosa' nanak yaqo skahol sa mtnaq Gaga' naha' ro yaqo mosa' 'llaw iyal baqon mita' sa rqyas ro inrkyasan naha', aw'ro kkayal sa kay' naha' mosa' hmkangi' sqo sisay pinsqtoxan na lalo' naha' sraral la, nano' skahol sa wayal skal qani pspong lga, mosa' nanak yaqo maha "Ptasan Zoko" qo mosa' m'olow kya qo lalo' naha' la. pinslabang mqyanox na glow na Ptasan aring sa minqotox sraral (ptasan族群從ptasan時代的發展) pinslabang kahol na ptasan sraral hya' ga aring sqo songos na mbhozyaw qo sqoliq niya' ro msgagay mshzi' tay bbzinah na rhzyal, kahol sqo mshzi' lro m'sazing na olah ka glow na 'tayal sqo glow na sziq qaniy la. babaw niya' lawzi lga, nano' qo sazing olan nqo Ptasan ka 'tayalro sziq qaniy ga, nyox mtboci' msinna cyogal oziy qo olah naha' nanak oziy la. ro taqo glow na 'tayal hya' lga, mslabang mqyanox lawziy lro nyox msincyogal oziy qo pinbcyan na kkayal kay' naha' misow qaniy la, nano' glow na Mkmoyaw, ro glow na Mesali', ro glow na Kinhakolcyogal ini' ptnaq oboy na kkayal kay' qaniy. nano' qo olah na sziq oziy ga, mslabang mqyanox oziy lro nyox msincyogal oziy qo pinbcyan na kkayal kay' naha' misow qaniy oziy la, nano' yaqo glow na Troko', ro glow na towda', ro yaqo glow na Tkdaya' cyogal ini' ptnaq pinbcyan kkayal na kay' naha' qaniy. yalaw gi wayal swalan na Sexo' olah na sziq maha' ptboci' nanak mg qotox nanak na Zoko' lrow, iyat pkaki' sqo mosa' mako' pngaygay pinqzyo' babaw niya' qo olah naha' hya' la.
